name: RejuvenatingSoundsforSleep,Relaxation,Focus
0:
”Alexa open rejuvenating sounds”
”Alexa ask rejuvenating sounds to play for 30 minutes”
”Alexa stop”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: rejuvenating sounds
des:
Ambient sounds from nature are proven to help boost your focus at work, sleep better at night, or just help improve your mindfulness altogether.

All you need to do is say Alexa start Rejuvenating Sounds, and she will play the track for 30 minutes. This is a perfect skill to leave on while you are asleep, to use for relaxation and meditation, or to tune in and focus on your work. 

Check out this article to learn more about the amazing benefits of listening to nature sounds to help improve your sleep, relaxation, or focus! https://www.huffingtonpost.com/2015/05/26/productivity-tips-nature-_n_7314216.html

That's all there is to it! We hope you enjoy this. 

If you have any suggestions for improvement, or would like to request more sounds, please let us know at support@stokedskills.com

Check out our other skills and more at http://stokedskills.com/
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
